title: my lol wont launch
body: Ok so I searched "why wont my LoL launch" and I was taken to this site and I read around and tried a few things but the main one I tried told me to search through my files specifically RADS and then to delete my LoL launcher but I did not see that anywhere in my files, then there was a secondary solution that I'm to computer incompetent to understand. Granted I just got this pc able to run games so I'm new to this whole thing but I just wanna play someone help Plz :c

replies.body:
If it's a newer pc, you most likely just need to setup your permissions to tell your OS to allow League to launch with the files it needs. Check out this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and you should be on your way ^_^. 

Definitely hit me back up if that's not helping out though so I can have you try a couple other steps.
